GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 0057428 |footnotes = |website = }} 'Branch' is a
city in Franklin County, Arkansas, United States. It is part of the Fort Smith,
Arkansas-Oklahoma Metropolitan Statistical Area. The population was 357 at the
2000 census.
